org.apache.sling.repoinit.parser.operations

Class SetAclPrincipalBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sling.repoinit.parser.operations.Operation
      • org.apache.sling.repoinit.parser.operations.SetAclPrincipalBased

  • @ProviderType
public class SetAclPrincipalBased
extends Operation
    Set ACL statement that groups a set of AclLines that all refer to the same set of principals.

        @NotNull
public @NotNull java.lang.String asRepoInitString()
        Description copied from class: Operation
        Converts this operation instance to a RepoInit string representation including the current operation parameters. The representation must be parsable back into an equivalent operation and must end with a OS-compatible line separator.
        Specified by:
        asRepoInitString in class Operation
        Returns:
        the repoinit string for the operation
